column1: '''''orna''''' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "tall, high, lofty".<ref name=PE17>{{PE
column2: 17}}, pp. 112, 186</ref> Another gloss given is "hasty".<ref name=LR>{{LR
Words, Phrases and Passages]]", the word derives from [[Sundocarme
''Etymologies'']], Quenya ''orna'' ("hasty") derives from root [[GOR]] ("violence, impetus, haste").<ref name=LR/>
